channel.title: [Delta, 317] Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
channel.description: Okay Guys, Claws Fury And I Are Trying To Code A Blackmark System.. I Did All I Was Supost To Do But I Got 4 Errors Help Me Please!?! Compiler Code: [code]client.java:9097: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try{ ^ client.java:9111: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try{ ^ client.java:17653: illegal start of expression if(blackMark >= 1 && <= 3){ ^ client.java:17656: illegal start of expression if(blackMark >= 4 && <= 7){ ^ 4 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: [Delta, 317] Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

Ok, I’m done editing. Use this code.

[code=java]
/**

  • Command to add marks to a player.

  • Username must be “Coder Perses” for this to work.
    */
    if (command.startsWith(“addmark”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Coder Perses”)) {
    try{ // A try statement must have a catch or finally statement.

             String otherPName = command.substring(8);
         int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                 /*
                  * The following codes are for what the command will do.
                  */

                 if(otherPIndex != -1) {
                         client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                         p.blackMark += 1;
                         p.updateRequired = true;
                         p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                         p.sM("You have been given a black mark by "+playerName+", Check your quest tab for how much marks you have.");
                         sM("You have just given "+p.playerName+" a Black Mark.");
                 }

 } catch (Exception e) { // Catch statement for the above try statement.
         sM("Try entering a name you want to add marks to...");
 }

} // Ends mark adding command.

/**

  • Command to delete marks to a player.

  • Username must be “Coder Perses” for this to work.
    */
    if (command.startsWith(“deletemark”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Coder Perses”)) {
    try{ // A try statement must have a catch or finally statement.

             String otherPName = command.substring(11);
         int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                 /*
                  * The following codes are for what the command will do.
                  */

                 if(otherPIndex != -1) {
                         client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                         p.blackMark -= 1;
                         p.updateRequired = true;
                         p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                         p.sM("One of your black marks has been taken away by "+playerName+", Check your quest tab for how much marks you have.");
                         sM("You have just taken away a Black Mark from "+p.playerName+"");
                 }

 } catch (Exception e) { // Catch statement for the above try statement.
         sm("Try entering a name you want to delete marks to...");
 }

} // Ends mark deleting command. These codes have been fixed by Usman555 from moparscape.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta, 317] Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay We Fixed 2/4 Errors These Are The Errors Left. Heres Last 2:

client.java:9097: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try{ ^ client.java:9111: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try{ ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Heres My Commands For The blackMark System:

if (command.startsWith("addmark") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Coder Perses")) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.blackMark += 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.sM("You have been given a black mark by "+playerName+", Check your quest tab for how much marks you have."); sM("You have just given "+p.playerName+" a Black Mark."); } } } if (command.startsWith("deletemark") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Coder Perses")) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(11); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.blackMark -= 1; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.sM("One of your black marks has been taken away by "+playerName+", Check your quest tab for how much marks you have."); sM("You have just taken away a Black Mark from "+p.playerName+""); } } }Remember This is 2 Different Codes, Not Only One…

item.title: [Delta, 317] Help ASAP [Delta, 317]
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

  1. ‘try’ without ‘catch’ or ‘finally’
    add this after the } which is closing the “try” thing:
    catch (Exception exception)
    {return;}
  2. if(blackMark >= 1 && <= 3){
    you must change it into
    if((blackMark >= 1) && (blackMark <=3)){

Im not an experienced java-coder but i know these things.
These should work, if they dont work, post the errors.

Read full topic
